__e: I wanted to go over Dolly's test scores with you and see if you gave any more thought to the medications.
Nope, I was home when you texted, with Dolly and Michael.

And, given that you love Dolly... and Dolly loves you... after a mother-daughter conversation... very interesting for both of us... I give my consent... that she should live with you for the rest of your days."
